fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] You have been registered for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Congratulations {{ order_owner_full_name }} has purchased the below ticket(s) for you to attend {{ summit_name }}. In order to claim your ticket, you must fill in the required details. Your registration information is below:

{{ ticket_number }}

  • Type: {{ ticket_type_name }}
  • Attendee: {{ owner_email }}
  • Promo Code: {% if promo_code is defined and promo_code|length %} ({{ promo_code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
  • Price: {{ ticket_currency_symbol }}{{ ticket_amount }} {{ ticket_currency }}
  • {% if need_details is defined and need_details is sameas true %}
  • Additional Information Required to Issue Ticket
  • {% endif %}

 

Your ticket *HAS NOT* been issued yet. You must claim your ticket by filling in the required details before your ticket can be issued. Please click the button below to enter your details:

Accept your ticket to {{ summit_name }}

We look forward to issuing your ticket and seeing you at {{ summit_name }} If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Order Confirmation for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Hey {{ owner_full_name }} thank you for purchasing ticket(s) to attend {{ summit_name }}. This is your order confirmation and your order details are below:

 

  • Order Number: {{ order_number }}
  • Price: {{ order_currency_symbol }}{{ order_amount }} {{ order_currency }}

 

Tickets Included:

  • {% for ticket in tickets %}
  • {{ ticket.number }}
    • Type: {{ ticket.ticket_type_name }}
    • {% if ticket.has_owner is defined and ticket.has_owner is sameas true %} Attendee: {{ ticket.owner_email }} {% else %} Attendee: UNASSIGNED {% endif %}
    • Promo Code: {% if ticket.promo_code is defined %} ({{ ticket.promo_code.code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
    • Price: ticket.currency_symbol{{ ticket.price }} {{ ticket.currency}}
    • {% if ticket.need_details is defined and ticket.need_details is sameas true %}
    • Additional Information Required to Issue Ticket
    • {% endif %}
  • {% endfor %}

 

PLEASE NOTE! Tickets must be assigned and all attendee details must be entered to issue the ticket.

If the ticket is already assigned the attendee will have received an email to enter attendee details.

If the ticket has not been assigned then when assigned the attendee will receive an email to enter attendee details.

If you prefer to add the required attendee information yourself, you may do so on the manage orders page.

Once all information is entered, the ticket will be issued and emailed to the assigned attendee.

Manage your Orders

Thank you again for your purchase, we look forward to seeing your attendees at {{ summit_name }}. If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Your registration for {{summit_name}} has been cancelled
fields.html_content:
Hey {{ owner_full_name }}, your registration for {{ summit_name }} has been cancelled or reassigned. You are no longer registered to attend this event. We hope to see you at a future event. If you believe this was a mistake please contact {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Your Ticket for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Hey, {{ owner_full_name }} you’ve done it! Thank you for completing the details required to issue your ticket to: {{ summit_name }}.

Your ticket is attached to this email and displayed below. You will be able to scan the QR code in this email or from a print out of the attached ticket when you check in at the event.

For reference Your ticket:

{{ ticket_number }}

  • Type: {{ ticket_type_name }}
  • Attendee: {{ owner_email }}
  • Promo Code: {% if promo_code is defined and promo_code|length %} ({{ promo_code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
  • Price: {{ ticket_currency_symbol }}{{ ticket_amount }} {{ ticket_currency }}

 

We look forward to seeing you at {{ summit_name }}. If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Order Confirmation for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Hey {{ owner_full_name }} thank you for purchasing ticket(s) to attend {{ summit_name }}.

There is no account in our system associated with your email address. In order to manage your order (assign tickets, edit attendee details, request a refund, etc.) you will need to create an account. Simply click the button below to create an account and manage this order:

This is your order confirmation and your order details are below:

  • Order Number: {{ order_number }}
  • Price: {{ order_currency_symbol }}{{ order_amount }} {{ order_currency }}

Tickets Included:

    {% for ticket in tickets %}
  • {{ ticket.number }}
    • Type: {{ ticket.ticket_type_name }}
    • {% if ticket.has_owner is defined and ticket.has_owner is sameas true %} Attendee: {{ ticket.owner_email }} {% else %} Attendee: UNASSIGNED {% endif %}
    • Promo Code: {% if ticket.promo_code is defined %} ({{ ticket.promo_code.code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
    • Price: ${{ ticket.price}} {{ ticket.currency }}
      • {% if ticket.need_details is defined and ticket.need_details is sameas true %}
    • Additional Information Required to Issue Ticket
      • {% endif %}
    • {% endfor %}

PLEASE NOTE! Tickets must be assigned and all attendee details must be entered to issue the ticket.

If the ticket is already assigned the attendee will have received an email to enter attendee details.

If the ticket has not been assigned then when assigned the attendee will receive an email to enter attendee details.

If you prefer to add the required attendee information yourself, you may do so on the manage orders page.

Once all information is entered, the ticket will be issued and emailed to the assigned attendee.

(requires an account)

Thank you again for your purchase, we look forward to seeing your attendees at {{ summit_name }}. If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Attention! Some attendees to {{summit_name}} in your order still need to accept their ticket
fields.html_content:

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Your order refund request for {{summit_name}} has been accepted

  • Order Number: {{ order_number }}
  • Price: {{ order_currency_symbol }}{{ order_amount }} {{ order_currency }}

    • Price: {{ticket.currency_symbol}}{{ ticket.price }} {{ ticket.currency}}

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team
